ReferenceDocuments.name: Was the [is/was] the reason t

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Provide the reason why a Finding About test was not collected.

ReferenceDocuments.name: FAREASND
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTM variable listed in the column with the heading "SDTMIG Target".

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor-defined Controlled Terminology may be used. The reason the data are not available may be chosen from a sponsor-defined codelist (e.g., broken equipment, subject refused, etc.) or entered as free text. When --REASND is used, --STAT should also be populated in the SDTM-based dataset.
